author: Nathan Baldwin
comment: The music and the different genre is very nice but if my phone is not actually on the app it only plays 2 songs ish and then no sound I would have to close the app and re open to listen to again, anyone else experiencing something like this?
title: Music is great but

author: Lewis Schofield
comment: I can't request or make shoutouts like shown in the pictures. If you add requests (and link it to the list of available songs if possible) I'd be eternally grateful and give you 5 stars :D
title: Okay but...

author: Reinis Riters
comment: When someone is calling and I answer, music doesn't stop playing. I have to hang up, turn off the radio and call back. Some songs are louder then others.
title: Few bugs, but great music.

author: Darksilverjesse
comment: The length of music vs the glitches makes it still better than the I heart app
title: Glitchy at times

author: Jack Morgan
comment: Playback is unreliable, unable to tune in to the station at times and is known to cut-off often, requiring app restart.

author: asdf ghjkl
comment: I want to know how to request/shoutout, as I have no idea where the buttons are, and for paying real money instead of just joining a tf2 server with a !radio plugin, I demand satisfaction and the functionality of the server plugin version.
title: How do I request/shoutout?

comment: I can't see the request option, it's glitchy ect. Please help me fix the problem. Also I have a Huawei Ascend G620S-L01
title: Need help!

author: Jess Huberd
comment: Has closing app and other problems that make app to annoying to keep dealing with. Like music just not app ATM.
title: Fix then maybe reinstall

author: Matt Horwood
comment: Love fragfm and all its musical goodness but I would love a alarm and a sleep timer so I can enjoy without music playing all night :)
title: No sleep timer

author: Amethyst
comment: They fixed the App and it works smoother than ever! Now it deserves stars. Awesome app and my favorite online radio.
title: Back to 5 Star

author: _Kyle-
comment: I love frag radio. But on this app with my nexus 5 I cannot hear a thing when everything fully loads
title: Can't hear anything

author: Nathan Echols
comment: It won't play music for some reason. Please fix.
title: Love FragRadio but its broken

author: Vicente Calderón
comment: A little suggestion:  You should put the Request option in the app.

author: Titania
comment: Awesome app!  Could you guys add a request option IN the app itself?

author: Gareth Foot
comment: Can't see a way to request songs?

reply.author: FragRadio
reply.content: This should be fixed as of the latest update.

title: Getting there

author: Chris Memo
comment: Amazing app

reply.author: FragRadio
reply.content: This should be fixed as of the latest update. Thanks for your patience

author: Peter Rouse
comment: I used frag radio everyday on my phone but since the latest changes I have not been able to n listen to it. Please give updates soon. Or atleast put it to how it used to be pleas3

reply.author: FragRadio
reply.content: This should be fixed as of the latest update. Thanks for your patience

title: Please update

author: Christian Amjet-ty Casper Pagulayan Gutierrez
comment: I Would like a refund.. I've waited far too long.. your app never work on my device.. waited for a long update... wasted my money.  REFUND please.
title: Samsung s6 edge Bad performance.

author: abdel samih
comment: No longer works just an static screen

reply.author: FragRadio
reply.content: This should be fixed as of the latest update. Thanks for your patience

title: Needs updating but awesome radio

author: Karlo Mihić
comment: Love it , but where is exit button??  I really dont know how to exit from this app except turning off my phone. I am on motorola defy (MB 525). 4 stars cuz of that and it should really use UI update (more colour or wallpapers etc..)
title: I absolutely love it!

author: sportsquid
comment: The app is very basic and old looking. The notification glitches and won't go away. After a few minutes the app stopped working and wouldn't play music.
title: Not good

author: Joe Lamont
comment: The only way to stop is to force close. Pause button doesn't work. If this is fixed, then it's perfect
title: Good, but one little thing...

author: Tsenkei
comment: The app is very good, but the icons are little bit blurry, and it would be cool if you put option to set sleep timer to shut app off. But in overall application is great. Good work FragRadio.
title: It's good.

author: Max Siegieda
comment: Good app, clean, it needs a few more things though and doesn't work on all devices. I have an android set-top-box device with ethernet and still get a message to 'connect to wifi or use 3G to play the radio' so can't actually listen on that device (minix neo x7)
title: Good, but there are more features to be added

author: William Yang
comment: Please consider adding a exit option , I hate going through the application Manger and force stop if the app isn't responding.
title: Please consider this feature

author: Custom Override
comment: I love the idea for the frag radio app,  but it needs work,  on my Sony Xperia z2 the app constantly freezes up and stays running in the background,  hopefully this can be fixed but for now I would say this app is unreliable to use!
title: It's ok

author: Gavin Powell
comment: The app has been updated so I have updated my review to reflect this.  The developer obviously listens and the app has much improved already.  Thank you very much for paying attention to the requests. Keep up the good work

reply.author: FragRadio
reply.content:
Hi Gavin,

We're working on a fix shortly for the issues you have raised. We thank you for supporting the station! :)

Alex

title: App is much improved

author: sean mccormick
comment: I heard this Station on a csgo server and I haven't stopped listening to F.R. keep up the amazing work guys!
title: Love it

author: Rob Daw
comment: Ever since the update the app does not work. Please fix this!

reply.author: FragRadio
reply.content: This should be fixed as of the latest update. Thanks for your patience

author: stunterz100
comment: The music laggs very much since the new update...
title: Lag...

author: Mr Luigi
comment: Does just what i expected it to, also love the simple design!
title: Brilliant App

author: A Google User
comment: I am at a loss for words Frag radio the best radio ever listen to I heard it on a tf2 server and I never stop

author: Max Meszaros
comment: Would like to see a notification screen pause button though, but still gets the job done.
title: Good app

author: Tom Ferguson
comment: love FR, listen to it almost everyday had to support it by getting the app and it was well worth it
title: Love FR

author: Adam Haigh
comment: An amazing well written app. recommended to all my friends!

author: James Ellis
comment: Fast song changing no lag and short buffering (half a second)
title: Amazing

author: Will Schafer
comment: Eppi c
title: I like it!

author: Matti Moilanen
comment: I love fragradio and this app works. Keep it up.
title: Solid application

author: gabe
comment: Great app. Please update the UI e.g. Sharper icons.

reply.author: FragRadio
reply.content: Hi Gabriel, we've received a few reports of blurry icons, and we're working on fixing it asap. Thanks for letting us know! ^Rossy

title: Please update the UI
